Mais d'un autre c√¥t√©, il fait moins qu'un h√¥tel au sens classique du terme (ambiance, d√©co, services sur place). En r√©sultent des bonnes surprises (le buffet du petit-d√©jeuner, le personnel adorable, le mobilier et accessoires en chambre) mais aussi certaines surprises ou frustrations qui nous rappellent que l'endroit n'est pas tout √† fait un h√¥tel (d√©co, pas de restaurant le soir, sdb type PMR, le frigo et le micro onde √† dispo pour se restaurer en totale autonomie).

Mais malgr√© ces contradictions, j'y reviens toujours avec plaisir. Et c'est certainement parce que j'aime bien ce lieu que j'en attends plus finalement :)

reviews.positive_text: The hotel really has a lovely view of the Lake. The rooms are smaller in size (almost hostel like) but there are plenty of common spaces to hangout around the property, including a lovely big dining hall - so it was very comfortable. The property is very clean, well maintained and the breakfast served each morning was excellent with a decent range and great coffee. The hotel has no restaurant attached but there are plenty of vending machines for a midnight snack or drink available. Location wise, it is well located, with a 5-7 minute walk to the nearest bus-stop.

reviews.negative_text: The room reminds me of a student accommodation. Could do with air-conditioning as it was stuffy due to the hot weather.

reviews.positive_text: The room was nice, big and clean. There was plenty of parking. The best part though was the lake view from the breakfast tables in the morning.
reviews.negative_text: Location was a bit inconvenient if you don't have a long time there.

reviews.review_title: Good value for many (when it is not too hot)

reviews.negative_text: No airco, very small room, very small shower, garden not inviting to stay (no seats / tables).

reviews.positive_text: The view is amazing and the breakfast too. The staff is very nice. Overall it is nice.
reviews.negative_text: The floor of the room was not clean, chips and other things were on the ground.

reviews.review_title: The best option for such pricing in Annecy

reviews.negative_text: The lack of air conditioning and problems with wifi

reviews.positive_text: Friendly staff, good facilities and excellent views to land and lake.
perfect for what i needed for one night
Breakfast was decent! Parking without additional fees.Public bus stop in short walk.
reviews.negative_text: No air conditioner. We were aware of that and temperature at night was quite ok, so we opened both windows and slept well; however, to stay in room during day time, specially on top floor, would be challenging. We stayed there in mid July.

reviews.review_title: Not quite hotel standard but fully acceptable at the price
reviews.positive_text: You are in a training centre and not a hotel But everything functional. Breakfast simple but adeqate. Location in a suburb - the lake is about 20 minutes walk but from my room, there was a pleasant view over the lake and town. Buses in Annecy are free in July-August. Plenty of parking.
reviews.negative_text: My room was clean enough, but it could do with a work-over.

reviews.positive_text: Quieter out of town location - but less than 5 min walk to bus stop for free July and August bus into town. Or 2km walk and you're at Petit Port on the lake - the nicer and quieter part anyway! Great staff and good breakfast and clean room with lake views. Well worth it for what I paid.
reviews.negative_text: Two pillows for sure would have been more comfortable.

reviews.positive_text: The staff were friendly and most helpful. Breakfast was very nice!
Good staff.  Good breakfast, clean room.  There are tea accessories.  There is parking!!!
reviews.negative_text: There were cockroaches in the room.Blinds knocked on the window, it was difficult to sleep.

reviews.review_title: Good location and accommodation for easy driving access to Annecy.
reviews.positive_text: Comfortable accommodation with a balcony.  Distant view of the lake.  Breakfast was good and nice to have shared access to a microwave and fridge.
reviews.negative_text: Unfortunately we hit some hotter days, so air conditioning would have been nice.

reviews.positive_text: Breakfast was good, there is a flexible check-in time (an option for those, that can't make it in time of the official hours). There was enough parking space. The room was clean. I would say it is a good place for a night on your trip.
reviews.negative_text: The rooms don't have any AC. So it can get quite hot in the room.

reviews.positive_text: Breakfast was good
reviews.negative_text: Don‚Äôt have air conditioning

reviews.positive_text: Great view. Good parking options. Varied breakfast. Need a car to go into Annecy.
reviews.negative_text: Small room. Two single adjacent beds.The rate changed as soon as I touched the button 'pay' but it was too late resulting in paying more than I agreed. Cleanliness on the breakfast room terrace balcony was poor.

reviews.review_title: An enjoyable night staying in the beautiful town of Annecy.
reviews.positive_text: Good location. The view from the dining room overlooking Lake Annecy was wonderful. The room and en-suite bathroom were clean. The bed was comfortable.
reviews.negative_text:
I got to the hotel at about 21.00 hours, after the receptionist had left. They did try and send me the information to get into the hotel room, but somehow I didn‚Äôt get it. 
With a bit of help from another guest I did eventually contact the after-hours receptionist to get the necessary info.
This caused me a little stress but was resolved reasonably quickly.
Overall I enjoyed my stay, this didn‚Äôt affect it too much.

reviews.review_title: Stay for the views, not the room
reviews.positive_text: The view was amazing of Lake Annecy.
reviews.negative_text: The bed was very uncomfortable - too hard.

reviews.positive_text: Nice staff. Reasonable breakfast. But really nice views during breakfast!!
reviews.negative_text: 3km from the centre. Basic accommodation. Then again, worth the money

reviews.review_title: An okay stay, but not excellent.
reviews.positive_text: Quiet room, good breakfast.
reviews.negative_text:
The double bed (mattress) was a bit wobbly.
Our request to stay in the room until 11.30 hr was denied by the staff at the desk, but granted by the housemaid.

reviews.positive_text: Room is very clean. Breakfast is very good. Reception is good. We came late for check in, they arranged very quickly.
reviews.negative_text: The bed for 2 people is too small.

reviews.positive_text: Price with breakfast, excellent value.

reviews.review_title: A great value for travelers with a car.
reviews.positive_text: Simple and clean, a great view of the lake and mountains from the room and the dining hall. our family room for 3 was well laid out.
reviews.negative_text: Breakfast choices, especially bread, were limited.

reviews.positive_text: The room was nice and clean and the personnel were friendly.
reviews.negative_text: For the amount I paid I had expected a little more, the room was rather small and there was almost no way to store my luggage before check-in time due to no one being around reception, but breakfast was good and the view was stunning at least!

reviews.review_title: room was dissapointing, place is outdated, but nice location with great views
reviews.positive_text: check in was easy, enough parking space, breakfast room with great views of Annecy lake
reviews.negative_text: the single bed was small, there was a smell of desinfectant coming from the bathroom, I had the corner room for disabled people

reviews.review_title: Excellent value for money... clean spaces and friendly service
reviews.positive_text: I have stayed in another two rooms in the recent past and although they were more spacious this time (Rm 710) the lack in space was compensated by the excellent view.  Other ammenities were satisfactory
reviews.negative_text: Room 710 was a bit small for someone with a large suitcase

reviews.positive_text: Proximity to my work. Value for money.  Very friendly staff.  The breakfast, which was included in the price, was amply diverse and fresh.
reviews.negative_text: Bed was smaller than i expected and for which I thought I had paid.

reviews.review_title: One night stay for a seminar
reviews.positive_text: The stay was great for me as I was attending a seminar the following morning. Great view of the lake, and a nice quiet neighborhood. Friendly staff also. Back in two weeks time.
reviews.negative_text: The reception closes early, 19:00 on a week day, I arrived at 18:30 and it was unattended, it took me until 18:55 to find someone to help me. I should update my phone details as they did send me details to my phone. So as I see it, bad for them as the desk was unattended and my fault for not updating my contact details.

reviews.review_title: Simple but functional with great view of lake
reviews.positive_text: Situated on hill overlooking lake view is lovely. Room simple, like student accommodation, but perfectly functional. Cost was reasonable compared to hotels in Annecy.
reviews.negative_text: No restaurant on site, or nearby, but vending machines.  Single bed adequately comfortable.

reviews.positive_text: Was the cheapest at the moment and they allowed me to go for superior room even if the modifications where not allowed(was more money so make sense)
reviews.negative_text: The check in is only available 4 to 7 but also there is no reception after 11am therefore there is no way to leave the luggage. When you do the check in they only give you the key so why not automatic. The breakfast was poor. Not happy about the location neither but that I knew.

reviews.positive_text: The view was absolutely stunning. I couldn't get enough of it.
reviews.negative_text: The room was really small but convenient. A hair dryer would have been a bonus :-).

reviews.positive_text: good location for price and distances.
The room was clean and comfortable. If you are lucky you can have a room viewing lake Annecy.
reviews.negative_text: The snack machine often didn't work properly. Breakfast lasted till 9:30, but they started clearing the buffet at 9:10. So if you came in a bit late there was hardly any food left.

reviews.positive_text: Clean, spacious rooms. Free parking. WiFi.
reviews.negative_text: Area it was in. Nice enough, but out of town, with no obvious restaurants or bars within walking distance... but we knew this when we booked.

reviews.review_title: It is a university campus so very simple and clean
reviews.positive_text: On the whole the place was nice. The breakfast was excellent, and the dining room had a nice view while we had breakfast. The accommodation is a university campus so the rooms are as such - very simple, but clean and tidy. There is a very good Italian restaurant and a burger/fast food restaurant within easy (10-15min) walking distance of the campus.
reviews.negative_text: The check-in desk was only open until 19:00, so we had difficulty finding the exact place/room to stay. Although I must add that we booked via Booking.com and on their platform there was a map link to the accommodation via Google maps, this did lead us directly to the location, practically the front door. I was't aware of this and only used my TomTom navigation device and entered the address given in the confirmation email. Tip: use google maps for the (final) part of your journey. The one thing I really didn't like was the bed, it squeaked like nothing I'd slept in before.

reviews.positive_text: Quiet location, old town easy to reach by bike, great view of the lake, very friendly staff
reviews.negative_text: The single rooms with sea view offer everything you need, but are really small.

reviews.positive_text: It was clean
reviews.negative_text: Inaccurate directions to the hotel from the train station. Front Desk lady was very unhelpful & somewhat rude. WiFi connection was terrible she had no reply to why it wasn‚Äôt working one day. Breakfast was very underwhelming only cold foods.

reviews.positive_text: Everything was clean, the view from the apartment was amazing, the car park was included in the price
reviews.negative_text: No vegetables at the breakfast buffet

reviews.review_title: Wonderful stay - Ill come back next time I visit Annecy!
reviews.positive_text:
- Extremely good value for the price
- Beautiful view of lake from room
- Extremely clean
- Good breakfast
- Very friendly staff
- Free luggage storage
- Well connected to the centre by bus; short walk from the lake (I actually preferred being out of the busy centre)
- Supermarket nearby
reviews.negative_text:
- No tea/coffee making facilities in room - it would have been perfect with a kettle
- Breakfast options a little limited if you have a gluten allergy (lots of cereals, breads and cakes). Still able to have eggs, ham, cheese, fruit, yogurt and preserves, but would have been great if there was a gluten free cereal or bread option (minor point!)

reviews.positive_text: Very good place with an amazing view over the lake. Basic rooms but with very comfortable beds. We spent a very hot weekend in Annecy (36 C) but the window shutters helped a lot. Tasty breakfast with local specialties. Great and very helpful staff. When again in Annecy we'll come back here.

Everything was perfect ‚Äî from the warm staff and comfortable room to the stunning view and delicious breakfast. I truly recommend this cozy hotel.

reviews.review_title: Great view, good breakfast, and lovely staff
reviews.positive_text: The location was good. While a 20 minute bus ride away from the centre it is in a lush green quiet part of town, with beautiful views of Lac d'Annecy and the mountains. There is an expanse garden to sit and enjoy the view or during the breakfast. The breakfast lounge and selection is very good. Favourite part of the stay easily. Staff are very friendly and helpful. Place is clean and welcoming. There is a fridge and microwave in the common area which I wish I spotted sooner.
reviews.negative_text: Don't have any major dislike. The room is spacious enough for a single bedroom; I wish the bed was slightly comfier but it is still decent.

reviews.review_title: A gem of a place to stay if you want calm, clean simplicity.
reviews.positive_text: Annecy can be busy and the Centre Jean XXII is a calm haven from the hustle and bustle. It is airey, simple, clean modern and calming. Unlike other reviews we thought it was excellent for access to the centre of Annecy - a 10 minute walk (bit less going out, bit more returning due to the hill) to the bus stop for the frequent No. 1 bus. Easy and efficient.
reviews.negative_text: There was nothing we didn‚Äôt like.

reviews.review_title: A great stay! Highly recommend it
reviews.positive_text: I absolutely loved the view from my room: the mountains and the lake. Even though the room itself is quite small, it wasn't really an issue, because it was clean, comfortable and had everything I needed. There's also a little balcony) The breakfast was also quite good: croissants and pain au chocolat, fruit, yoghurt, good coffee, juices, eggs and ham/cheese to make a sandwich. For me it was enough. There's also a fridge and a microwave on the first floor, in case you want to buy some readymade food. But do right your name on the food!
reviews.negative_text:
The only thing I didn't have in the room is a hairdryer, but I asked at the reception and it wasn't a problem. 
It's cool that there's a coffee machine downstairs in case you want to have some coffee or tea during the day, but the coffee and tea isn't very good there. Would be really cool to have  some hot water or just water too:)

reviews.positive_text: Good breakfast with variety of food.   Clean good size room.   Ample free parking.  Friendly lady at front desk.    You do need a car or taxi for Old Town.

reviews.positive_text: The rooms are new and very clean. We were 3 in the room and so it was convenient that they are proposing double and single room in one room. We have a tea and coffee machine in the room and we can also have additional blankets and pillows from the cabinet. The bathroom is quite small but very clean. The breakfast buffet was amazing with lots of varieties and choices. The receptionist (a guy) was very helpful and gave us instructions for the public transport. Highly recommended!

reviews.positive_text: The breakfast was good !! You have everything to eat, bread, milk, cereal, cheese, ham, yogurt and boiled eggs done by yourself. The room was neat and clean. I would definitely choose this place if I come again. I am traveling by myself today~~the single bed room was a great option for me. I arrived early, but they let me leave my luggage at the storage room and I can go to for lunch an and do some shopping. Location is also good. May need to walk up a bit. But have bus directly to the central every15 mins, which was very convenient for me. Enjoyed my stay.
What a gem! You need a car or walk uphill to reach the hotel but the view from the rooms is worth it. The breakfast was good enough.

reviews.positive_text: Excellent hotel for arriving after a nice walk in Annecy, so the price for just sleeping there is perfect. The rooms are clean and fully equipped, the breakfast is just enough to begin your day. Yes, it's a little bit far from the city center, but nothing that the local bus can't fix, and the reception attention was very good. The reception closing hour is at 19hrs, but if you write to them, they will give you instructions so you can make the check in after their closing time. For sure I would stay with them again, I was very happy.

reviews.negative_text: Er is standaard geen dagelijkse schoonmaak voorzien. Je moet dit vragen bij de receptie. Geen ijskastje, geen airco, wel een ventilator. Er hingen spinnenwebben in de kamer en op het balkon. Verder was er bij het ontbijt enkel koude hardgekookte eitjes en geen warme gebakken eitjes met spek bijvoorbeeld. Het hotel is wat afgelegen. Aan de receptie krijg je weinig info. Er hangt een QR-code op de kamer, daarmee kan je info ophalen. Dat vind ik nogal onpersoonlijk. Als je aan het onthaal bier of wijn bestelt, moet je om glazen vragen. Op de kamer staat er een dolce gusto maar de cupjes worden niet aangevuld indien je meerdere nachten blijft, 1 cupje per persoon voorzien. Idem voor de waterkoker, 1 zakje thee per persoon. Je kan van wifi gebruik maken maar dan moet je je mailadres invoeren (privacy).

Parere complessivo, in rapporto anche al costo: ci siamo trovati abbastanza bene, quindi il voto √® buono.
